content.rendered:
Wednesday, January 22, 2025
Today is an “A” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • Best Buddies will meet Wednesday January 22nd at 2:20-3:00 in the LGR.
  • Come join us today for voice club! We will warm up from the cold with some “Just Dance”, then work on our sight singing skills and NYSSMA solos.
  • MAGSA will have its next meeting on Wednesday, January 22nd in room 138.
  • No Place for Hate is meeting Wednesday after school. Please sign up for one of the 3 focus groups before coming. Signups are outside of room 257.
  • The Heritage Garden Club is offering two scholarships for Maple Ave. Middle School students in grades 6-7 to attend Camp Colby in the Adirondacks free for one week this summer! Camp Colby offers fun and adventure with hands-on science lessons, games, and outdoor exploration led by experienced counselors. For more details and how to apply, see your science teacher or Mr. Scrivo! Applications are due January 24.
  • The Maple Avenue Musical Club proudly announces its production of Matilda featuring 73 talented students from Maple Avenue! The show will take place on Friday, January 31 at 7:00 PM; Saturday, February 1 at 1:00 PM & 7:00 PM; Friday, February 7 at 7:00 PM; Saturday, February 8 at 1:00 PM & 7:00 PM. Tickets are on sale now through the QR code on the posters placed around school or online. Tickets will also be available at the door. The cost is just $5 for students. We hope to see you there!

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
